resources.string: Press back key a few times to see memory leak

Click the button then press back key. After back and forth a few times, the LeakCanary will be able to catch the memory leak in the code (Be patient, it takes some time for leakCanary to find out the memory leak). The solutions are also provided in the code (commented out). Once you understand the code, replace the bad codes with right codes. You will find out that the memory leak problems are gone.
